attributes.action: request that the Secretary of State for Health, Alan Johnson issue a Direction to all Chief Executives of the NHS who have awarded pay increases of more than 1.9% to managerial and executive staff in 2009, to submit an explanation as to why the awards have been given and how the increases have been calculated.  Furthermore, we petition the Secretary of State to publish a report within the next six months based upon the information submitted for scrutiny and discussion by elected Members of Parliament, the outcome to be made public knowledge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
